body.name: Groove Life Groove Belt Low Profile - Men's Stretch Nylon Belt with Magnetic Aluminum Buckle, Lifetime Coverage
features: Origin Made in the USA and Imported

DESIGN; Designed with the perfect amount for a comfortable all-day fit, just adjust to fit once and forget. Features a slim, rounded edge buckle design with thinner webbing, fitting all belt loops, and anti-flap keeper loop to neatly tuck the end behind the belt.

MATERIALS; made from premium materials, ensuring that it is durable and long-lasting. The buckle uses high strength, neodymium magnets for an easy snap-on/snap-off, and includes what we like to call Stiff-Tech webbing (aka: no folding in your belt loops).

SIZING; We offer a wide range of sizes, from XS to XL, to ensure the perfect fit for all body types. Just match your pant size and we’ll do the rest. Check out our sizing guide in the product images for additional details.

NO BS WARRANTY; If you feel like your Groove product is not living up to your standards, we’ll do what we can to make it right. Our 94 Year No BS Warranty covers any manufacturing damages. If it's not our bad, (lost, cosmetic, etc.) we’ll cover that too! Replacement fees and taxes may apply.

BORN IN ALASKA. BUILT IN TENNESSEE; Adventure Guide Peter Goodwin realized his lifestyle demanded better gear backed by unbelievable customer service. Groove Life was launched in a freezing garage in Port Alsworth, AK. Five years later, Groove Life employs over 200 people in Tennessee.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Belt Sizing 2 Men's Ring Sizing 3 Women's Ring Sizing 4 Watch Band Sizing 5 Wallet Sizing

Previous page Slim & Sleek Featuring a modern, barely-there design. This belt is the epitome of “fashion meets function”. Stiff-Tech This belt is gonna stay on you like the bad tattoo from your last metal show and not lose its form. Anti-Flap For the occasional rogue fly away, we’ve added our secure keeper loop. Snap-Tech The correct term is neodymium magnets but we like to say Strong as Hell. Just listen to that SNAP! Space-Tech Proprietary webbing, rare earth neodymium magnets and A380 aluminum alloy buckle Next page 1 Slim & Sleek 2 Stiff-Tech 3 Anti-Flap 4 Snap-Tech 5 Space-Tech

How does the Groove Belt Low Profile compare to the Groove Belt? Made with the same materials as its predecessor but with a much smaller buckle and webbing! We designed this belt to fit the smallest belt loops, so ladies and men can enjoy its versatility. What size Groove Belt should I order? Match the belt size you order to your pant size! If you're at the high end or on the cusp of a size, we recommend sticking with the size down. For example, if you're right at 36" or right at 37", we'd recommend ordering a medium. What's the strength of the Groove Belt magnet? Is it safe around pacemakers, phones, etc? The high strength neodymium magnets are N42 magnets. It is safe for use around your phone. We do not recommend our belt if you have a pacemaker or any other medical device that may be affected by magnetic fields. Will the belt set off metal detectors? Are they TSA approved? Yes, they are subject to setting off metal detectors and are not TSA approved. We advise you to remove your belt and wallet before going through the metal detector. How can I clean or care for my Groove Belt? Mild soap and warm water are all you need for cleaning! We recommend cleaning after a fair amount of wearing just to be sure dirt doesn’t hang around. For the belt, a stain remover pen has also been known to do the trick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use (after initial setup)
reviews.reviewText: This really is a great belt; it's comfortable, it flexes just enough, and has a sturdy build quality. The only difficulty with this belt is getting the size adjusted. It is necessary, and thankfully it only needs to occur once. While it is a bit pricey, if it lasts as long as they say, it is well worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good looking and fits just about all sizes
reviews.reviewText: Looks good, easy to buckle, store and very sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable and shockingly thin
reviews.reviewText: So I’m a bigger guy and I bought groove life belts before, about three times. each time they cut into my abdomen. The belt was very difficult to get through dickies pants belt loops because you had to use a lot of force to get it through the belt loops, so when I saw this one, I figured I would buy it. and I automatically assumed it would just be the same thing. I received it yesterday and my gosh this belt is thin, don’t let the Amazon picture make you think it’s just the same size one and maybe slightly thinner, this one’s about half the size of the original groove life belt, so I just put it on this morning. It’s incredibly easy to get through dickies belt loops, without force. it just slides right through the belt loops. the only thing I would recommend is to remove the little thing that’s holding down the flap because it won’t fit through the belt loops. It doesn’t dig into my abdomen when I’m sitting down which is amazing. it’s very elastic for a belt this thin, it actually holds my pants up, which is really nice so overall I would definitely get this belt again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy on and off. Not the easiest to adjust specially with arthritis.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid belt that’s easy to adjust
reviews.reviewText: This belt has a clean minimalistic look and is good quality. It’s easy to adjust without having to rely on notched holes. It’s one of my favorite belts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Fits as it says. Very comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not very durable.
reviews.reviewText: I received this belt as a Christmas gift. In the first couple of days I had scratched the buckle up and can't even remember anything that could have done it. I believe it could also be little wider. I had a 5.11 belt before this and never had to tug at my pants. This belt you will have to keep extra snug. Overall it's an attractive belt but needs a more durable finish and a wider webbing.
